src:
孕妻自拍露肚照太火辣「凍袂條」　潘逸安不守戒暗笑：我有研究
07 Nov 2019, 10:45 by 蔡世偉
37歲8點檔男星潘逸安和小10歲圈外老婆Vivian交往1年多，今年5月登記結婚，Vivian預產期在11月底，小倆口將迎來女兒，潘逸安看超音波照片，女兒的臉胖嘟嘟，因而喚前世情人「小米菇」。Vivian儘管即將「卸貨」，身材依舊火辣，日前她靈機一動，自拍懷孕照，性感指數破表，潘逸安看到照片直呼「凍袂條」。
潘逸安表示，前幾天老婆喜孜孜地秀出她的自拍照，照片中Vivian對著鏡頭小露肌膚、肚子，她四肢纖細，肌膚白皙，若非頂著孕肚，根本看不出已懷胎9月，照片成果直逼專業等級。潘逸安好氣又好笑說：「她趁我不在家，自己立腳架、調燈光，一個下午就拍完幾十張照片，我還氣她為何不找攝影師拍，萬一有什麼閃失怎麼辦。」潘逸安對老婆的自拍照還是挺滿意，大讚很火辣，但還是調侃老婆「果然是網紅，很會抓鏡頭」。


潘逸安（右）和老婆Vivian平時相處十分融洽。（艾迪昇傳播提供）

Vivian身高160公分，懷孕體重始終控制在50公斤以下，體重管控得宜，潘逸安笑著透露：「其實她是因為嫌我太胖，看我開始不吃澱粉、甜食，她也跟著一起不吃。」潘逸安和老婆一起控制飲食，看著鏡中自己日益精壯，忍不住發下豪語，等到胸部、腹部練出肌肉線條，就要和老婆一起拍雙人寫真。被問到老婆懷孕後，是否就開始「清修守戒」的生活，他笑著透露看了很多研究報告，確定房事對老婆健康無礙，所以「一直都很美滿」。
潘逸安即將當爸，坦言心境轉變不少，他以前一人飽全家飽，現在鞋子、衣服都不買了，全省起來給老婆、女兒。他已把嬰兒房全佈置好，該買的都已經添購完畢，他咋舌說：「原來嬰兒床竟然要2萬多元，小朋友的東西好貴啊。」但他把醜話說在前頭，自己絕對當黑臉，不會溺愛女兒，卻被老婆打槍，虧他怎可能狠下心凶前世情人。夫妻倆目前不急著辦婚宴，預計等小米菇出世，Vivian做完月子，明年再拍婚紗、宴請親友。
更新時間｜2019.11.07 10:43
text:
Pregnant wife self-timer reveals that the belly is too hot "frozen strips" Pan Yian does not keep the ring smile: I have research
07 Nov 2019, 10:45 by Cai Shiwei
37-year-old 8 o'clock male star Pan Yi'an and 10-year-old wife Vivian have been in contact for more than 1 year. In May this year, they registered for marriage. Vivian is expected to be born at the end of November. The young couple will welcome her daughter. Pan Yi'an sees the ultrasound photo, daughter's face. Chubby toot, thus calling the past lover "small rice mushroom". Although Vivian is about to "unload", her body is still hot. Recently, she took a chance to take a selfie and took a pregnancy photo. The sexy index broke the table. Pan Yian saw the photo calling "Frozen Sticks".
Pan Yi'an said that a few days ago, her wife showed her selfie in a magpie. In the photo, Vivian showed her skin and stomach to the camera. Her limbs were slender and her skin was fair. If she was not pregnant, she could not see her pregnancy. The results of the photo are close to the professional level. Pan Yian said with a good air and a funny smile: "She told me that I was not at home, I had to stand on my feet and adjust the lights. I took dozens of photos in one afternoon. I was so angry that she didn't look for a photographer to shoot. What if there was anything wrong with it." Pan Yi'an is very satisfied with his wife's selfie. It is very hot, but it is still a slap in the face. "It really is net red, it will catch the lens."


Pan Yi'an (right) and his wife Vivian usually get along very well. (Aidi Sheng spread offers)

Vivian is 160 centimeters tall and her weight is always below 50 kilograms. The weight is well controlled. Pan Yian smiled and said: "In fact, she is because I am too fat. I don't want to eat starch or sweets. She also doesn't eat together." Pan Yi'an and his wife control the diet together. Looking at the mirror, they are becoming more and more sophisticated. They can't help but make a slogan. When they have muscles in the chest and abdomen, they must take a photo with their wife. After being asked if his wife was pregnant, she began to "clean up the guardian" life. He smiled and revealed many research reports to make sure that the housework is not harmful to his wife's health, so "it has always been very happy."
Pan Yi'an is about to be a dad, and frankly changed his mind. He used to have a full family. Now he doesn't buy shoes or clothes. He is all raised to his wife and daughter. He has arranged the baby room completely, and the purchase has been purchased. He said with a sigh: "The original crib actually cost more than 20,000 yuan. The children's things are very expensive." But he said the ugly words in front, absolutely When the black face, will not love his daughter, but was shot by his wife, how can he lose his lover? The couple are not in a hurry to hold a wedding banquet. It is expected that the Xiaomi mushroom will be born, Vivian will finish the month, and then take a wedding dress and banquet for friends and relatives next year.
Update time|2019.11.07 10:43
